column6: Yellow :: mandatory columns and shoul be at the same position

Green :: 
'Fixed' if the value of the field should be of fixed length as provided e.g. Phone number should always be of 10 digits not less
Blank:- For variable length value (max the value provided in size column)
List:- If you want field value to be picked randomly from the list provided e.g location
USAGE:- python generate_dataset.py -i Metadata.csv -f sample.csv -nrec 100000 -d ',' -hdr Y
